kairo_api_documentation.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the Kairo programming language

documentation_files.description: Cross-Platform C++ Standard Library Headers and compatibility layer
Type interfaces and concept definitions for the Kairo standard library
Template metaprogramming utilities for type manipulation and introspection
Core standard library functions and types for the Kairo language
Basic string type with full string manipulation capabilities
String slice type for efficient string operations without copying
Memory management utilities and operations for the Kairo language
Panic handling and error propagation system for the Kairo language
Interface definitions for panic-capable types in the Kairo language
Legacy C++ style memory allocation functions for backward compatibility
Standard error types for the Kairo language
Application Binary Interface utilities for symbol mangling and demangling
Global functions and macros available throughout the Kairo language
Core language features and syntax elements of the Kairo programming language
Built-in primitive and container types in the Kairo programming language

usage.format: Each JSON file contains detailed documentation for a specific namespace or category

structure.functions: Array of function documentation with signatures, examples, and specifiers
structure.classes: Array of class documentation with methods, operators, and examples
structure.types: Array of type definitions and usage examples
structure.interfaces: Array of interface definitions and requirements
structure.enums: Array of enumeration definitions and values

usage.examples: Each entry includes a complete main function example showing usage

kairo_syntax.questionable_types: T? in Kairo becomes Questionable<T> in C++
kairo_syntax.generators: yield T in Kairo becomes Generator<T> in C++
kairo_syntax.casting: T as U syntax for type conversion

documentation_format.functions: Short description, Kairo function signature, examples with main function, specifiers/modifiers
documentation_format.classes: Short description, class name, function documentation for each method, usage examples
documentation_format.specifiers: noexcept, const, constexpr, inline, static, etc.
